channel.title: Wiki Village Wiki Page
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Wiki Village Wiki Page" - Redundancy FTW!

item.title: Re: Wiki Village Wiki Page
item.content:encoded:
Ananvil could definitely be the Village Ramen chef. =)

Haha, awesome. Next update I'll include that :)

item.title: Re: Wiki Village Wiki Page
item.content:encoded: Ananvil could definitely be the Village Ramen chef. =)

item.title: Re: Wiki Village Wiki Page
item.content:encoded: Wiki page updated, please let me know if there's any information you would like changed in reference to yourself, or any editorial suggestions you'd like made.

item.title: Re: Wiki Village Wiki Page
item.content:encoded: Soon I'm going to be rewriting most of that stuff with the feedback presented here, so don't worry :)

item.title: Re: Wiki Village Wiki Page
item.content:encoded: Well, the wiki entry already has Snakeman as being responsible for the NRF and Science! Workshop. I'd say there's an opening for head potion researcher at the Potion Palace. I can imagine Wilford sitting down at the end of the day with a row of potions and a spreadsheet. Takes a sip, muscles bulge "Good." Takes a sip, suit explodes, "……….Promising."

item.title: Re: Wiki Village Wiki Page
item.content:encoded: Mayby something like a mad scientist could be useful…

item.title: Re: Wiki Village Wiki Page
item.content:encoded: Wilford would definitely be a bookkeeper, probably filing the village information that is brought to the War Room or working hard in some other information hub.

item.title: Re: Wiki Village Wiki Page
item.content:encoded: I could see Alyson being a researcher or librarian of some kind…or something…shes always got her nose in a book studying…

item.title: Re: Wiki Village Wiki Page
item.content:encoded: Position of "SWATBU Lurker" suits me fine. If it is open. :P

item.title: Re: Wiki Village Wiki Page
item.content:encoded: I already posted in the village but just in case I wanted to be weapons specialist for the village.

item.title: Re: Wiki Village Wiki Page
item.content:encoded:
Hey Tom,

This is kind of the wrong thread to ask to join, since this thread has to do with the Wiki page. I'm afraid we're also currently at 50 active villagers (and there are people who've applied before you as well), so letting you in would require kicking someone else out. This doesn't necessarily mean that you can't get in, it just means it's going to take some time, since we'll have to wait for people to leave the village or for people to stop playing.

Also, as a slight note proper capitalization and spelling help a lot when writing applications for villages, in addition to posting in the correct area.

Since this thread isn't supposed to be about joining the village, I'm going to delete your post here and this post tomorrow to get this thread back on topic.

item.title: Re: Wiki Village Wiki Page
item.content:encoded:
i would like to join.i can help in bigo job…please accepet me!
my name is Tom Black

item.title: Re: Wiki Village Wiki Page
item.content:encoded: I'd like to be the village Spymaster. I've done a great deal of spying since I joined, and it fits with my character's backstory - Jupiah's father was a retired SWATBU Spymaster.

item.title: Wiki Village Wiki Page
item.content:encoded:
I've updated our Village page. It's available at: The Wiki. I've tried to give our Village a bit more life, provide it with a little more of a backstory, and such. Most of the changes are in the description section. Any criticisms or suggestions for the page are certainly welcome.

If you'd like to have an 'official' role in the Village, feel free to post here, and I can try and incorporate you in the page as much as I can. Ideally, I'd like to associate players with our various village upgrades, both to give our upgrades a bit more personality, and to give our members some more flavor as well!

This is completely optional and mostly just for fun. Feel free to ignore this if you don't care about it :)
